attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Review the administration of the Barnett formula and place it on an open, honest and fair system of administration which is determined and agreed by the UK parliamentary system ensuring that the populations of England, Scotland and Wales receive fair and equitable subsidies in a manner which is publically accountable.

rejection.details: Your title, currently 'Mike Grundy' should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
